mergewith.subtemplate:
<stateNode id="OBAMA_ModelIndicator.s:$(n)" spec="parameter.IntegerParameter" lower="0" upper="14">0</stateNode> <parameter id="OBAMA_gammaShape.s:$(n)" name="stateNode">1.0</parameter> <parameter id="OBAMA_ProportionInvariable.s:$(n)" lower="0.0" name="stateNode" upper="1.0">0.1</parameter> <stateNode id="OBAMA_hasInvariableSites.s:$(n)" spec="parameter.IntegerParameter">1</stateNode> <stateNode id="OBAMA_hasGammaRates.s:$(n)" spec="parameter.IntegerParameter">1</stateNode>
<!-- frequencies estimation --> <stateNode id="OBAMA_useExternalFreqs.s:$(n)" spec="parameter.BooleanParameter">false</stateNode> <stateNode id="OBAMA_frequencies.s:$(n)" spec="parameter.RealParameter">0.25 0.25 0.25 0.25</stateNode>
<distribution id="OBAMA_GammaShapePrior.s:$(n)" spec="beast.math.distributions.BMTPrior" count="@OBAMA_hasGammaRates.s:$(n)" x="@OBAMA_gammaShape.s:$(n)"> <Exponential id="Exponential.0" name="distr"> <parameter lower="0.0" name="mean" upper="0.0" estimate='false'>1.0</parameter> </Exponential> </distribution>
<distribution id="OBAMA_PropInvariablePrior.s:$(n)" spec="beast.math.distributions.BMTPrior" count="@OBAMA_hasInvariableSites.s:$(n)" x="@OBAMA_ProportionInvariable.s:$(n)"> <Beta name="distr" alpha="1.0" beta="4.0"/> </distribution>
<prior id='OBAMA_MutationRatePrior.s:$(n)' x='@OBAMA_mutationRate.s:$(n)'><distr spec="OneOnX"/></prior>
<siteModel id="OBAMA.s:$(n)" spec="beast.evolution.sitemodel.OBAMAModelTestSiteModel" gammaCategoryCount="4" proportionInvariant="@OBAMA_ProportionInvariable.s:$(n)" shape="@OBAMA_gammaShape.s:$(n)" hasGammaRates="@OBAMA_hasGammaRates.s:$(n)" hasInvariantSites="@OBAMA_hasInvariableSites.s:$(n)"> <parameter id="OBAMA_mutationRate.s:$(n)" estimate="false" name="mutationRate">1.0</parameter> <substModel id="OBAMA_substmodel.s:$(n)" spec="OBAMAModel"> <frequencies id="OBAMA_empiricalFreqs.s:$(n)" spec="Frequencies" data="@$(n)"/> <useExternalFreqs idref="OBAMA_useExternalFreqs.s:$(n)"/> <modelIndicator idref="OBAMA_ModelIndicator.s:$(n)"/> <model spec="OBAMA_Blosum62" /><!--"Blosum62"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_CpREV" /><!--"CpREV"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_DCMut" /><!--"DCMut"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_Dayhoff" /><!--"Dayhoff"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_HIVb" /><!--"HIVb"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_HIVw" /><!--"HIVw"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_JTT" /><!--"JTT"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_LG" /><!--"LG"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_MtArt" /><!--"MtArt"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_MtREV" /><!--"MtREV"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_MtMam" /><!--"MtMam"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_RtREV" /><!--"RtREV"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_VT" /><!--"VT"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_WAG" /><!--"WAG"/--> <model spec="OBAMA_FLU" /><!--"FLU"/--> </substModel> </siteModel>
<operator id="OBAMA_hasGammaRatesFlipper.s:$(n)" spec="BMTBirthDeathOperator" count="@OBAMA_hasGammaRates.s:$(n)" rates="@OBAMA_gammaShape.s:$(n)" weight="0.1"/> <operator id="OBAMA_gammaShapeScaler.s:$(n)" spec="BMTScaleOperator" count="@OBAMA_hasGammaRates.s:$(n)" parameter="@OBAMA_gammaShape.s:$(n)" scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.5"/>
<operator id="OBAMA_hasInvariableSitesFlipper.s:$(n)" spec="BMTBirthDeathOperator" count="@OBAMA_hasInvariableSites.s:$(n)" rates="@OBAMA_ProportionInvariable.s:$(n)" weight="0.1"/> <operator id="OBAMA_ProportionInvariableScaler.s:$(n)" spec="BMTScaleOperator" count="@OBAMA_hasInvariableSites.s:$(n)" parameter="@OBAMA_ProportionInvariable.s:$(n)" scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.5"/>
<operator id='OBAMA_mutationRateScaler.s:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.5" weight="0.1" parameter="@OBAMA_mutationRate.s:$(n)"/>
<operator id="OBAMA_ModelIndicatorUniformOperator.s:$(n)" spec="UniformOperator" parameter="@OBAMA_ModelIndicator.s:$(n)" weight="3.0"/> <operator id="OBAMA_FreqsFlipOperator.s:$(n)" spec="BitFlipOperator" parameter="@OBAMA_useExternalFreqs.s:$(n)" weight="0.1"/>
<log id="OBAMA_ActivePropInvariable.s:$(n)" spec='beast.util.Script' expression="OBAMA_ProportionInvariable * OBAMA_hasInvariableSites" argnames="OBAMA_ProportionInvariable OBAMA_hasInvariableSites"> <x idref="OBAMA_ProportionInvariable.s:$(n)"/> <x idref="OBAMA_hasInvariableSites.s:$(n)"/> </log> <log id="OBAMA_ActiveGammaShape.s:$(n)" spec='beast.util.Script' expression="OBAMA_gammaShape * OBAMA_hasGammaRates" argnames="OBAMA_gammaShape OBAMA_hasGammaRates"> <x idref="OBAMA_gammaShape.s:$(n)"/> <x idref="OBAMA_hasGammaRates.s:$(n)"/> </log>
Scales mutation rate of partition s:$(n)
Prior on gamma shape parameter for partition s:$(n) Prior on proportion invariant for partition s:$(n)
Scales gamma shape parameter of partition s:$(n) Scales proportion invariant of partition s:$(n) Switches gamma rates on/off of partition s:$(n) Switches invariant sites on/off of partition s:$(n) Switches equal frequencies of partition s:$(n) Resersible jump of subst models for partition s:$(n)
